mapper.select: select yr_dt as yrDt, unit, val from national_debt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO national_debt (yr_dt, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}
INSERT INTO gdp (yr_dt, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}
INSERT INTO gdi (yr_dt, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}
INSERT INTO gni (yr_dt, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}
INSERT INTO enmc_grrt (yr_dt, cty_nm, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{cty_nm}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}, cty_nm = #{cty_nm}
INSERT INTO base_rate (yr_dt, mon_dt, dy_dt, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{mon_dt}, #{dy_dt}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}, mon_dt = #{mon_dt}, dy_dt = #{dy_dt}

INSERT INTO exchn_rate (yr_dt, mon_dt, dy_dt, type, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{mon_dt}, #{dy_dt}, #{type}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}, mon_dt = #{mon_dt}, dy_dt = #{dy_dt}, type = #{type}
INSERT INTO cnsmr_inrt (yr_dt, mon_dt, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{mon_dt}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}, mon_dt = #{mon_dt}
INSERT INTO src_inrt (yr_dt, mon_dt, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{mon_dt}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}, mon_dt = #{mon_dt}
INSERT INTO lvng_inrt (yr_dt, mon_dt, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{mon_dt}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}, mon_dt = #{mon_dt}
